The 12factor Application

Oct 8, 2014

The 12factor Application

A methodology for building modern, scalable, maintainable software-as-a-service apps.

A nice read for people building web-applications, primarily those with software-as-a-service business models. The 12factor methodology was written around 2-3 years ago, but it’s still pretty relevant until today.
